channel.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
channel.description:
I do not understand what is wrong with Mopar...
Mopar used to work, but now it doesn't. Everytime I try to run the bot, or Run Mopar in general, it always shows this error:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
I have java, so I don't know what the problem is. It's worked before but not now, why is this? Someone help.
Thanks, and btw if you need any screenies I can do that.

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Scathe Scathe
item.description:
@Scathe wrote:

Nevermind, my paths are already set.

This is starting to tick me off…

Mopar’s peice of crap compiler. =\

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @Speak Speak
item.description:
@Speak wrote:

to set you path do this

go to:
start>right-click my computer>advanced>click environmental variables
make a new variable and name it “PATH” and add “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin” to it
then make another variable and name it “CLASSPATH” and add “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin” to it

and if you have a different version of jdk change the jdk1.6.0_1 to the version you have

Read full topic
